relation.text: called the Butcher of Gloucester , for the Murther of a Constable at May-Fair , at Justice-Hall in the Old-Baily , on the 7th and 8th of July
was indicted for the Murther of one Frances Dromett , his Wife , on the 9th of June
went a weeding in the Gardens at Chelsea-College , and on Thursday Morning
was indicted for the Murther of John Cooper a Constable , on the 12 of May
were going within three Days after
said , That he was a wounded Man , and had plaid a Prize the 29th of April
